DOC.brief_summary: The main objective is to quantify energy expenditure when using the SmartDrive system during manual wheelchair propulsion in external conditions (slope, straight line). For this two comparisons are performed: Comparison of energy expenditure with and without the use of a system SmartDrive 6 minute propulsion test. Comparison the risk of musculoskeletal disorders of the wrist during a 6 minute propulsion test.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Physiological and Biomechanical Efficiency of the PAPAW
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective study mono-centric, controlled, randomized cross over. Randomization of the equipment (without and with SmartDrive). 22 SCI manual wheelchair users. 22 caregivers (healthy subjects)
DOC.criteria: men and women aged between 18 and 70 years spinal cord injury having given free and informed consent No affiliation to a social security scheme Refusal to participate in the clinical trial Patient under guardianship Major cognitive disorder Bedsores Acute complication or systemic organ
